text: Ourense ( , ; ) is a city and capital of the province located in the autonomous community of Galicia, northwestern Spain. It is on the Portuguese Way path of the Road of St James (Camino de Santiago). It's also known as A cidade das Burgas (galician) due to its hot springs. ==References== Category:Capital cities in Spain Category:Province of Ourense Category:Municipalities in Galicia
title: Ourense
